sentences.en: A "global ballast partnership" hopes to reduce this risk.
sentences.cn: 一份名为“全球压舱物伙伴”的协议便是旨在减少这种风险。

sentences.en: Ballast water is carried in cargo ships to provide needed stability.
sentences.cn: 压载水由货船装载，以提供必要的稳定性。

sentences.en: The idea is to kill the organisms in the water before the ballast is released.
sentences.cn: 这套方案的目的是在排放压舱水杀死其中的生物。
